mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SALES_PLAN WHERE ( CASE #{dateSearchCondition} WHEN 'salesPlanDate' THEN TO_DATE(SALES_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN 'dueDateOfSales' THEN TO_DATE(DUE_DATE_OF_SALES, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SALES_PLAN WHERE TO_DATE(SALES_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(#{salesPlanDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT * FROM SALES_PLAN WHERE MPS_APPLY_STATUS IS NULL AND ( CASE #{searchCondition} WHEN 'salesPlanDate' THEN TO_DATE(SALES_PLAN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHEN 'dueDateOfSales' THEN TO_DATE(DUE_DATE_OF_SALES, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES_PLAN ( SALES_PLAN_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, SALES_PLAN_DATE, UNIT_OF_SALES, DUE_DATE_OF_SALES, SALES_AMOUNT, UNIT_PRICE_OF_SALES, SUM_PRICE_OF_SALES, MPS_APPLY_STATUS, DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( #{salesPlanNo}, #{itemCode}, #{itemName}, #{salesPlanDate}, #{unitOfSales}, #{dueDateOfSales}, #{salesAmount}, #{unitPriceOfSales}, #{sumPriceOfSales}, #{mpsApplyStatus}, #{description} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SALES_PLAN SET ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode} , ITEM_NAME = #{itemName} , SALES_PLAN_DATE = #{salesPlanDate} , UNIT_OF_SALES = #{unitOfSales} , DUE_DATE_OF_SALES = #{dueDateOfSales} , SALES_AMOUNT = #{salesAmount} , UNIT_PRICE_OF_SALES = #{unitPriceOfSales} , SUM_PRICE_OF_SALES = #{sumPriceOfSales} , MPS_APPLY_STATUS = #{mpsApplyStatus} , DESCRIPTION = #{description} WHERE SALES_PLAN_NO = #{salesPlanNo}
UPDATE SALES_PLAN SET MPS_APPLY_STATUS = #{mpsStatus} WHERE SALES_PLAN_NO = #{salesPlanNo}
